abstract: Microsoft has approved a proposal to allow shareholders to vote on its executives’ compensation, as U.S. corporations’ pay policies come under scrutiny in the wake of the financial crisis.
snippet: Microsoft has approved a proposal to allow shareholders to vote on its executives’ compensation, as U.S. corporations’ pay policies come under scrutiny in the wake of the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has approved a proposal to allow shareholders to vote on its executives’ compensation, as corporations’ pay policies come under scrutiny in the wake of the financial crisis, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Microsoft to Let Shareholders Vote on Executive Pay
